subtitleNullable: A Dataset To Identify Wafles And Ice-creams In Images.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

There's something about the images of waffles, ice-creams , candies and all the sweet stuffs which makes the image itself drool worthy. So, I thought why not build a dataset of waffles and icecreams.

This dataset could then prove as an interesting way to explore different concepts in computer vision.

### Content

These images are scraped from the google image search. 

* There are two folders named "waffles" and "ice_cream".
* The "waffles" folder contains 355 images of different sizes.
* The "ice-cream" folder contains 343 images of different sizes.
* The images may contain watermarks or text overlays.

### Inspiration

This dataset can be used for -->
* Binary classification
* Object detection
* Transfer learning
* Can also be used alongwith other datasets based on food items.

Basically the possibilities are endless. What is needed is a pinch of creativity on how to use this dataset.
